name: TheHogwartsSortingHat
0:
”Alexa, open The Hogwarts Sorting Hat”
”Alexa, launch The Hogwarts Sorting Hat”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the hogwarts sorting hat
des:
Want to know what house you would be in at Hogwarts? Would you be in Gryffindor, Slytherin, Ravenclaw or Hufflepuff?
Simply ask The Hogwarts Sorting Hat and it will tell you.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
